weekly picks (Aug 4 week 2023)

Posted on August 21, 2023 in 2023aug,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Aug 4th week collection

  1. PhysRevB.108.085121 Staggered magnetic flux induced higher-order topological insulators and topological flat bands on the ruby lattice (flatband, PRB)

  2. PhysRevResearch.5.L032022 Pressure-enhanced fractional Chern insulators along a magic line in moire transition metal dichalcogenides (JCano, Physical Review Research)

  3. acsphotonics.3c00558 Topological Charge Constrained Photonic Skyrmion Defects in Split Plasmonic Vortices (skyrmion, ACS Photonics)

  4. apxr.202300054 Topological Phases in Magnonics (topological magnon, Advanced Physics Research)

  5. PhysRevLett.131.089701 Comment on ``Magnetization Compensation Temperature and Frustration-Induced Topological Defects in Ferrimagnetic Antiperovskite ${\mathrm{Mn}}_{4}\mathrm{N}$’’ (PRL)

  6. PhysRevLett.131.089702 Bayaraa, Xu, and Bellaiche Reply: (PRL)

  7. PhysRevLett.131.080401 Quantum Simulation of Topological Zero Modes on a 41-Qubit Superconducting Processor (PRL)

  8. PhysRevLett.131.086501 Observation of Electronic Strong Correlation in VTe2 sqrt{3} x sqrt{3} Monolayer (PRL)

  9. 2304.13698 Direct observation of N\‘eel-type skyrmions and domain walls in a ferrimagnetic DyCo$_3$ thin film (communications physics, arXiv)

  10. 2308.08418 Lasing, quantum geometry and coherence in non-Hermitian flat bands (arXiv)

  11. acf03c Tunable Dispersion Relations Manipulated by Strain in Skyrmion-based Magnonic Crystals (Chinese Physics B)

  12. JPSJ.92.084704 Theory of Magnetic Vortex Crystals Induced by Electric Dipole Interactions (Mochizuki, JPSJ)

  13. 2308.09707 Majorana zero modes in twisted transition metal dichalcogenides homobilayers (arXiv)

  14. 2308.09698 Correlation Effects and Concomitant Two-Orbital $s_\pm$-Wave Superconductivity in La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ under High Pressure (arXiv)

  15. 2308.09335 The geometric theory of low dimensional superconductivity (quantum geometry SC, arXiv)

  16. 2308.09044 High-$T_c$ superconductivity by mobilizing local spin singlets and possible route to higher $T_c$ in pressurized La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ (arXiv)

  17. 2308.08609 Pair density wave superconductivity: a microscopic model in two dimensions (HongYao, arXiv)

  18. 2308.08606 Two-dimensional altermagnets: A minimal microscopic model (altermagnet, arXiv)

  19. 2308.09528 Simple predictors of $T_c$ in superconducting cuprates reveal role of interactions between effective Wannier orbitals in the $d-p$ 3-band model (arXiv)

  20. 2308.09695 Anomalous Hall effect induced by Berry curvature in topological nodal-line van der Waals ferromagnet Fe$_4$GeTe$_2$ (arXiv)

  21. 2308.09589 Observation of termination-dependent topological connectivity in a magnetic Weyl kagome-lattice (arXiv)

  22. 2308.08771 Surface Instability and Surface Charge Orders in the Kagome Metal TbV$_6$Sn$_6$ (arXiv)

  23. 2308.08734 Strain Tuning Three-state Potts Nematicity in a Correlated Antiferromagnet (Strain, arXiv)

  24. 2308.09702 Non-Abelian quantum Hall states in multi-layer rhombohedral stacked graphene (XGWen, arXiv)

  25. 2308.09636 Critical enhancement of the spin Hall effect by spin fluctuations (Nagaosa, arXiv)

  26. 2308.08976 Visualizing the Localized Electrons of a Kagome Flat Band (arXiv)

  27. 2308.09700 Optical conductivity of tilted higher pseudospin Dirac-Weyl cones (arXiv)

  28. 2308.09282 Reconciling magnetoelectric response and time-reversal symmetry in non-magnetic $\mathbb{Z}_2$ topological insulators (AHMacDonald, arXiv)

  29. 2308.08837 Orbital Multiferroicity in Pentalayer Rhombohedral Graphene (arXiv)

  30. 2308.08684 Even-Odd-Layer-Dependent Symmetry Breaking in Synthetic Antiferromagnets (Synthetic AFM, arXiv)

  31. 2308.09163 $U(1)$ Defects on Domain Lines (arXiv)
